column5: $70 PER NIGHT FOR A MINIMUM OF 30 DAYS. IF YOU PLAN ON STAYING LONGER WE CAN NEGOTIATE.   * ALL UTILITIES ARE INCLUDED: WATER, ELECTRICITY, INTERNET, AND CABLE * 50 INCHES SMART TV IN THE LIVING ROOM * APPLIANCES INCLUDED WASHER, DRYER, STOVE, FRIDGE, & MORE * A FULL KITCHEN WITH MICROWAVE, TOASTER, AND ALL NECESSARY UTENSILS * MATTRESSES IN ALL 3 BEDROOMS ARE BRAND NEW, COMFY AND HIGH STANDARD * BLANKETS AND TOWELS ARE ALL PROVIDED  TEXT TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING AT ANY TIME
